item.title: Family of Israeli hostage Shiri Bibas says new returned body is hers
item.description: It comes as a new hostage and prisoner exchange between Israel and Hamas is expected on Saturday.

item.title: Trump says Starmer and Macron 'haven't done anything' to end Ukraine war
item.description: Trump's criticisms come as the UK and French leaders prepare to visit the White House next week.

item.title: Fit for a pontiff: Inside the Roman hospital caring for Pope Francis
item.description: The Gemelli hospital has been treating popes for more than thirty years.

item.title: Are planes crashing more often?
item.description: A recent flurry of air disasters have made some people worried about flying - but are crashes on the rise?

item.title: 'Trump is a dark horse': Russians on the invasion of Ukraine, three years on
item.description: A BBC team asking Russians about their invasion of Ukraine draws police and state TV attention.
